name: Band Prix 2094
description:
Band Prix 2094 is a GitHub Game Off 2018 entry (theme: hybrid). As such, it's a bit rough around the edges. But what isn't these days, am I right?

This is an exceedingly stupid hybrid racing/typing game in which the driving force of your vehicle is the power of music. Type the procedurally-generated lyrics quickly to win the 2094 season of our solar system's most prestigious racing competition. Presented in glorious ASCII.
